summary: This is an email chain from October 2019 regarding scheduling a meeting concerning Mark Epstein. The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and another individual, discussing a confirmed meeting that was missed due to a doctor's appointment and attempting to reschedule for October 31.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: The email chain is about scheduling a meeting concerning Mark Epstein, who is Jeffrey Epstein's brother.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is involved in scheduling a meeting, indicating ongoing legal proceedings or investigations.

connections.description: The prosecutor is scheduling a meeting concerning Mark Epstein, indicating he is a subject or person of interest in an investigation.

events.title: Missed Meeting Concerning Mark Epstein
events.description: A meeting scheduled for 3:00 PM between an Assistant U.S. Attorney and another individual concerning Mark Epstein was missed because the individual had a pre-scheduled doctor's appointment.

events.title: Proposed Rescheduled Meeting
events.description: Following the missed meeting on October 28, the individuals attempt to reschedule their meeting concerning Mark Epstein for October 31 at 3:00 PM.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the SDNY was actively scheduling a meeting concerning Mark Epstein in late October 2019.
The initial meeting date was October 28, 2019, but was missed due to a conflicting doctor's appointment.
The correspondence shows an attempt to reschedule the meeting for October 31, 2019, indicating ongoing legal or investigative activity related to Mark Epstein after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
